title: Chris Evans (basketball)
summary: Christopher Evans (born January 29, 1991) is an American professional basketball player for Rapid București of the Liga Națională. Standing at 2.03 m (6'8"), he plays the power forward position. After playing five years of college basketball at Coastal Carolina, Wabash Valley and Kent State, Evans entered the 2013 NBA draft, but he was not selected in the draft's two rounds.
